adjectives.description: sylphish (comparative more sylphish, superlative most sylphish)

entries.meaning: Resembling or characteristic of a sylph; sylphlike.
examples: All these on a neck of snow slight-tinged with rose-bloom, and within it royal Life: amidst the blaze of lustres ; in sylphish movements, espiegleries, coquetries, and minuet-mazes[.]
